a: By hiring chefs, you increase the profitability of your restaurants. Chefs work on an open-ended contract and accept payment in coins.
Coins are used to hire new employees and upgrade your restaurant. You can buy them for BUSD
Your restaurants generate income in money. You can freely exchange your money for BUSD at any time without fees.
The better the restaurent and the level of the kitchen, the more profit it brings.

Revenue from all restaurants goes to the money basket every hour. Collecting profits every day, you will receive money in your account.It is important to collect income daily; otherwise, you may lose part of the profit
If you want to finish the game, you can sell your business at any time and get money equivalent to 14 days of tower operation. However, you will stop receiving passive income.
